org.apache.lucene.index

Class DocValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.index.DocValues

  • public final class DocValues
extends Object
    This class contains utility methods and constants for DocValues

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BinaryDocValues EMPTY_BINARY
      An empty BinaryDocValues which returns BytesRef.EMPTY_BYTES for every document
      static NumericDocValues EMPTY_NUMERIC
      An empty NumericDocValues which returns zero for every document
      static SortedDocValues EMPTY_SORTED
      An empty SortedDocValues which returns BytesRef.EMPTY_BYTES for every document
      static SortedSetDocValues EMPTY_SORTED_SET
      An empty SortedDocValues which returns SortedSetDocValues.NO_MORE_ORDS for every document

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Bits docsWithValue(SortedDocValues dv, int maxDoc)
      Returns a Bits representing all documents from dv that have a value.
      static Bits docsWithValue(SortedSetDocValues dv, int maxDoc)
      Returns a Bits representing all documents from dv that have a value.
      static SortedSetDocValues singleton(SortedDocValues dv)
      Returns a multi-valued view over the provided SortedDocValues
      static SortedDocValues unwrapSingleton(SortedSetDocValues dv)
      Returns a single-valued view of the SortedSetDocValues, if it was previously wrapped with singleton(org.apache.lucene.index.SortedDocValues), or null.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • singleton

        public static SortedSetDocValues singleton(SortedDocValues dv)
        Returns a multi-valued view over the provided SortedDocValues
